thread.title: BT hits out at Sky over pay TV to deflect Openreach separation 'storm'
thread.title_full: BT hits out at Sky over pay TV to deflect Openreach separation 'storm'

author: James Quinn
title: BT hits out at Sky over pay TV to deflect Openreach separation 'storm'
text: Telecoms BT hits out at Sky over pay TV to deflect Openreach separation 'storm' Telecoms giant says regulatory landscape for pay television giant is 'lop sided' in submission to Ofcom's ten yearly review Gavin Patterson, chief executive, BT Group By James Quinn , Group Business Editor 5:00AM BST 09 Oct 2015
